comment: One of the best professors I've had at KSU! She's incredibly smart, insightful, down to earth, and always willing to help. Her class made me a more confident speaker. If you get the chance to take her, do it—you won't regret it!

This professor was really good. The 3rd party app that was used was Revel and its assignments and quizzes on there every week. and a choice board of discussion post, only 5 required in the semester. Overall amazing professor and she's very understanding and gives clear grading criteria. just pace yourself and don't miss deadlines. Test were easy.

Two words. TAKE HER! I'm a 30+ student so took her class while working a corporate job and also having to travel a lot for work this semester - all assignments were very straight to the point. There were 3 exams. Had to complete 5/13 assignments- very easy stuff! No final, just an EOY project that was the easiest thing I've ever done.
